long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically create hyperlinks in gmail. This extension will save you a ton of time Simply type a word or phrase and HyperG will automatically convert it into a hyperlink. Great for creating email signatures, affiliate links, commonly used words or phrases. Examples: - add matching text "google" with replacement of "google" will automatically link to "http://www.google.com/" - adding matching text "tseg" with replacement of The Search Engine Guys will automatically link to "http://www.tseg.com/" Just make sure to use html in the replacement box. Enjoy!
